description: Try our easy to follow Strawberry Charlotte recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Strawberry Charlotte Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Grease and line 4 x 1 cup-capacity ramekins with plastic film.
Remove and discard crust from butter cake. Slice into 1cm-thick slices. Cut 4 rounds to fit bases and tops, and rectangle pieces to line sides of ramekins. Press into place.

Place jam and 1/3 cup water into a small saucepan and stir over a medium heat until smooth and well combined. Add strawberries and cook for 2 minutes or until slightly softened. Transfer to a bowl to cool. Spoon and firmly pack 2/3 strawberry mixture into ramekins. Cover with remaining cake rounds and fold plastic over the top. Refrigerate for 3 hours.

purée the remaining strawberry mixture until smooth, adding a little warm water if required. Serve the strawberry charlottes dusted with a little icing sugar and the strawberry sauce. Note: To purée, place in a small saucepan; pour over enough water to cover; bring to the boil, simmer until tender. Drain.
